title: Military/Army SFX
description: A Professionally Hand crafted SFX and Music Pack for Real Developers for Real Games
longDescription:
DesireAudio's Unique Professionally recorded SFX pack is Perfect for Multi Genre gameplay from Car related games to epic competitive warfare. Your imagination is the limit!


The Story behind the Creator


Desire Audio is an online audio retailer created by Noah Kiely, a professional sound recorder and composer who has worked with creators of all backgrounds such as films, games and Animations.


Noah has worked on an award winning international film and extends his knowledge with depth into skills around mixing and mastering audio. His ambition is simply to meet the artists halfway to create work that fulfills their vision.


Features


This Audio Pack is perfect for developers and artists who are tired of buying new SFX and becoming disappointed with the lack of Integrity, quality and versatility.


Extra Features


The Pack additionally includes 2 Music Tracks composed by Noah Kiely that will ensure audio aspects of your project are fulfilled in this simple Audio Pack.


All audio is royalty free for commercial Use.


Support

If you have any questions, Queries or Requests email us at:

DesireAudio.Help@gmail.com.au

We'd Love to hear from you!
technicalDetails:
Features:

2 Limited Edition Music Tracks - Available

  • Main Title Theme
  • Atmospheric Suspenseful Cue

SFX

  •  Ambience/Atmosphere (Desert, Arctic, Grass Plain) - loop
  •  Collisions (Brick, Concrete, Metal, Wood, Glass)
  •  Drifting/tire screeching (Loop and non loop Variations)
  • Engine (Flat pitch and tone loop, Non loop variation with changing pitch and tone)
  • Explosions (Medium and Long Release Time)
  • Nitro Boost (Short, Medium and Long Attack time)
  • Gun Shots

-Artillery (Short and long)

-Heavy Bullets (Short and Long)

-Light Bullets

-Practice/Paintball Bullets

-Tank Canon Bullet (Short and Long)

  • Reloads

-Artillery reload

-Heavy Machine Gun Reload

-LMG Reload

-Practice/Multi Purpose Reload

-Tank Reload

-Missile Launcher Turret Reload

  • Rocket Missile

-Exhaust (Loop variation)

-Missile Shot (non-loop able variation )

  • Bomb Detonation

-Beep

-Buildup Beep + Explosion


Sample

Here is a small sample of some SFX from this pack.

Soundcloud


Number of Audio Waves: 114

Number of Audio Cues: 114

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 24bit

Minutes of audio Music: 11 Mins and 42Seconds

Minutes of SFX: All SFX is 1-30seconds, Engines and Ambience are up to 2mins 30seconds
